amazing puzzles, expanding the lore from the first game, added twist, meme worthy dialogue, really REALLY good voice over, good ost & sound effect and nice song at the end... all of those makes this one of the best game best ever

It was okay, in the future I would have ordered the steak instead of the salmon because the salmon was not nearly as good as the steak looked like it was. 3/5 would go back again for the steak instead.
Have you accepted Valve as your lord and savior?

The most compelling narrative puzzle game I have ever played. This sequel lives up to the reputation of its predecessor, and in fact, blows it out of the water with superior visual design, thrilling story, and novel interaction abound.
They took everything great about the first game and made it better, from the personality to the atmosphere. This makes me want a third installment of the series.
Very fun especially when drunk or high.

Very fun game and definitely better than the previous opus. However slightly disappointed by the length of the campaign which took me 9 hours to complete but very fun chara design which is lost further in the campaign to my regret.The multiplayer mode is very fun to play and offers some innovative conceots. However using only the mpas provided by the game the life duration of this game is at most 20 hours. you need to be willing to search for maps to play online, which is very simple to do but not always what you want to be doing.

There were far more puzzles than in Portal 1 but not as challenging. The dialogue is very funny as expected, and I enjoyed the game!
Incredible writing, just as good as it was hyped up to be and the puzzles were challenging and creative.
